resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104431</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104431</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085858</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Oral history and student learning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundgeschichte und Kursteilnehmerlernen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude orale d'histoire et d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprendizagem oral do history e do estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparare orale dell'allievo e di storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προφορική εκμάθηση ιστορίας και σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El aprender oral de la historia y del estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Oral history enriches historical knowledge; enhances research, writing, thinking, and interpersonal skills; gives students a connection to the community; and helps all students feel included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundgeschichte reichert historisches Wissen an; 
erhöht Forschung, Schreiben, das Denken und die 
Zwischenpersonalfähigkeiten; gibt Kursteilnehmern einen 
Anschluß zur Gemeinschaft; und Hilfen, die alle Kursteilnehmer 
enthalten glauben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire orale enrichit la connaissance 
historique ; met en valeur la recherche, l'écriture, la 
pensée, et les qualifications interpersonnelles ; donne à des 
étudiants une connexion à la communauté ; et aides que tous 
les étudiants se sentent inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O history oral enriquece o conhecimento 
histórico; realça a pesquisa, a escrita, pensar, e habilidades
interpersonal; dá a estudantes uma conexão à comunidade; 
e ajudas que todos os estudantes sentem incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia orale arricchisce la conoscenza storica;
aumenta la ricerca, la scrittura, pensare e le abilità tra 
persone; dà ad allievi un collegamento alla Comunità; ed
aiuti che tutti gli allievi ritengono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προφορική ιστορία εμπλουτίζει την ιστορική γνώση  
ενισχύει την έρευνα, το γράψιμο, τη σκέψη, και τις 
διαπροσωπικές δεξιότητες  δίνει στους σπουδαστές μια 
σύνδεση στην κοινότητα  και οδηγίες που όλοι οι σπουδαστές 
αισθάνονται συμπεριλαμβανόμενοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La historia oral enriquece conocimiento 
histórico; realza la investigación, la escritura, el 
pensamiento, y habilidades interpersonales; da a estudiantes una
conexión a la comunidad; y ayudas que todos los estudiantes se 
sienten incluidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHRYN WALBERT
FN:KATHRYN WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085858</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104431</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/oral-history-and-student-learning</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
